TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabelsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel>
Public Class CustomLabelsCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of CustomLabel)

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的集合物件，依序代表自訂標籤，物件可以使用。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the custom labels that an object can use. 這個類別會公開為集合的屬性物件。This class is exposed as the collection property of an object. > [!NOTE] > 您可以自動填入整個標籤資料列使用的自訂座標軸的標籤使用任何方法定義，其中包含`DateTimeIntervalType`引數。You can automatically populate the entire label row of an axis with custom labels using any method definition that includes a `DateTimeIntervalType` argument. 屬性表示在集合中的項目總數，通常用來尋找集合的上限。The property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

summary.span: 將 物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType) cil managed
Public Sub Add (labelsStep As Double, intervalType As DateTimeIntervalType)
public: void Add(double labelsStep, System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType intervalType);

param.name: labelsStep
param.span: 值，決定繪製自訂標籤的頻率。

span.span: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 決定間隔類型的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the interval type.

summary.span: 將多個型別為 的 物件加入集合中。

span.span: Adds multiple objects of type to the collection.

summary.span: 將標籤完整填入座標軸的第一個資料列。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立並初始化整個物件與軸的第一個標籤資料列指定型別的標籤。The method creates and initializes objects for the entire first label row of an axis with labels of the specified type. `labelsStep`參數會決定將繪製自訂標籤的頻率。The `labelsStep` parameter determines how often the custom labels will be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 在呼叫這個特定的方法定義之前，必須呼叫方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add (double fromPosition, double toPosition, string text);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add(float64 fromPosition, float64 toPosition, string text) cil managed
Public Function Add (fromPosition As Double, toPosition As Double, text As String) As CustomLabel
public: System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::CustomLabel ^ Add(double fromPosition, double toPosition, System::String ^ text);

param.name: fromPosition
param.span: 標籤所套用之座標軸範圍的最小值。

span.span: The minimum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: toPosition
param.span: 標籤所套用之座標軸範圍的最大值。

span.span: The maximum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: text
param.span: 標籤文字。

span.span: The label text.

summary.span: 使用指定的座標軸範圍和文字，將 物件加入集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection, using the given axis range and text.
The newly added object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將一個自訂標籤加入相關的座標軸的第一個標籤資料列。Adds one custom label to the first label row of the relevant axis. 會使用沒有標籤的標記。No label mark is used. 如果第一個標籤資料列中任何位置使用自訂標籤時，任何標籤會自動不產生該第一個資料列。If a custom label is used anywhere in the first label row, no labels are automatically generated for that first row. > [!NOTE] > 在呼叫這個特定的方法定義之前，必須呼叫方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format) cil managed
Public Sub Add (labelsStep As Double, intervalType As DateTimeIntervalType, format As String)
public: void Add(double labelsStep, System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, System::String ^ format);

param.name: labelsStep
param.span: 值，決定繪製自訂標籤的頻率。

span.span: A value that determines how often custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 列舉值，決定 labelsStep 參數的測量單位。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the unit of measure for the labelsStep parameter.

param.name: format
param.span: 決定自訂標籤格式的值。

span.span: A value that determines the format of the custom label.

summary.span: 將多個 物件加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds multiple objects to the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式將標籤完整填入座標軸的第一個資料列。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels with the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立並初始化座標軸的完整第一個標籤的物件資料列指定型別的標籤。This method creates and initializes objects for an axis' entire first label row with labels of the specified type. 決定多久會繪製自訂標籤，並選擇性標籤可指定格式化以及。The step determines how often the custom labels will be drawn, and optional label formatting can be specified as well. > [!NOTE] > 在呼叫這個特定的方法定義之前，必須呼叫方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.
